name: One Life (itch) (Revolution Game)
description:
Created for Untitled Game Jam #72.

RECOMMENDED TO PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - When the ability bar on the top left corner is filled, throw a punch that knockbacks enemy.

Q - Place a spike trap with 2 kills

E - Place a slowness trap with 2 kills

2 - Place a trap that push slimes backward with 2 kills

1 - Increase bullet count every click by 1 with 4 kills

Traps can only be spawned once before it is destroyed after 10 seconds.

Objective:
Don't let the slimes enter the dungeon, or let them touch you. You only have 1 chance, 1 life. It's all or nothing.

Check this out maybe
